titleStmt.title: A description of a strange (and miraculous) fish cast upon the sands in the meads, in the hundred of Worwell, in the county Palatine of Chester, (or Chesshiere. The certainty whereof is here related concerning the said most monstrous fish. To the tune of Bragandary.
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

publicationStmt.publisher: For Thomas Lambert, at the signe of the Hors-shoo in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Signed: M. P., i.e. Martin Parker.
Verse - "Of many maruels in my time".
Also erroneously listed as Wing D1143.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
